Step Description--> Traversed TO Home Page to Perform Liquor Category Updates
Step Description--> Click on Beer
Step Description--> Click on Second Product
Step Description--> Price of The Product is ₹ 95
Step Description--> Name of The Product is Haywards 2000 Strong
Step Description--> Availability status : IN STOCK
Step Description--> Clicked on Add to cart

Step Description--> Permit Not Applied
Step Description--> One Day Permit Cost is ₹ 5

Step Description--> Click on Pay On Delivery

Step Description--> Clicked on Orderstatus Button
Step Description--> Order No. 26508
Step Description--> Traversed to Order Details
Step Description--> Order Sucessfully Placed
